ScalarVariable.name: inertia.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.phi_a
ScalarVariable.description: Angle between left shaft flange and support

ScalarVariable.name: der(inertia.w)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi)))

ScalarVariable.name: der(lossyGear.phi_a)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Angle between left shaft flange and support)

ScalarVariable.name: der(emf.phi)
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of shaft flange with respect to support (= flange.phi - support.phi)

ScalarVariable.name: emf.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of shaft flange with respect to support (= flange.phi - support.phi)

ScalarVariable.name: emf.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Torque of flange

ScalarVariable.name: emf.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop between the two pins

ScalarVariable.name: emf.w
ScalarVariable.description: Angular velocity of flange relative to support

ScalarVariable.name: ground.p.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: ground.p.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.flange_a.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.a_a
ScalarVariable.description: Angular acceleration of flange_a with respect to support

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.eta_mf1
ScalarVariable.description: Mesh efficiency in case that flange_a is driving

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.eta_mf2
ScalarVariable.description: Mesh efficiency in case that flange_b is driving

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.flange_a.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.interpolation_result[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Result of interpolation in lossTable (= [eta_mf1, eta_mf2, tau_bf1, tau_bf2])

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.interpolation_result[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Result of interpolation in lossTable (= [eta_mf1, eta_mf2, tau_bf1, tau_bf2])

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.interpolation_result[1,3]
ScalarVariable.description: Result of interpolation in lossTable (= [eta_mf1, eta_mf2, tau_bf1, tau_bf2])

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.interpolation_result[1,4]
ScalarVariable.description: Result of interpolation in lossTable (= [eta_mf1, eta_mf2, tau_bf1, tau_bf2])

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossPower
ScalarVariable.description: Loss power leaving component via heatPort (> 0, if heat is flowing out of component)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.phi_b
ScalarVariable.description: Angle between right shaft flange and support

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant1
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss if w_a > 0 and flange_a.tau >= 0

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant1_p
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss at w_a = 0+ to determine driving side (flange_a.tau >= 0)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant2
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss if w_a > 0 and flange_a.tau < 0

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant2_p
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss at w_a = 0+ to determine driving side (flange_a.tau < 0)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant3
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss if w_a < 0 and flange_a.tau >= 0

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant3_m
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss at w_a = 0- to determine driving side (flange_a.tau >=0)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant4
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss if w_a < 0 and flange_a.tau < 0

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.quadrant4_m
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss at w_a = 0- to determine driving side (flange_a.tau < 0)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.sa
ScalarVariable.description: Path parameter for acceleration and torque loss

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tauLoss
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss due to friction in the gear teeth and in the bearings

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tauLossMax
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss for positive speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tauLossMax_p
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss for positive speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tauLossMin
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss for negative speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tauLossMin_m
ScalarVariable.description: Torque loss for negative speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_bf1
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute resultant bearing friction torque with respect to flange_a in case that flange_a is driving (= |tau_bf_a*eta_mf1 + tau_bf_b/i|)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_bf2
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute resultant bearing friction torque with respect to flange_a in case that flange_b is driving (= |tau_bf_a/eta_mf2 + tau_bf_b/i|)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_bf_a
ScalarVariable.description: Bearing friction torque on flange_a side

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_eta
ScalarVariable.description: Torque that determines the driving side (= if forwardSliding then flange_a.tau-tau_bf_a else if backwardSliding then flange_a.tau+tau_bf_a else flange_a.tau)

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_eta_m
ScalarVariable.description: tau_eta assuming negative omega

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_eta_p
ScalarVariable.description: tau_eta assuming positive omega

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.LossPower
ScalarVariable.description: Loss power leaving component via heatPort

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.R_actual
ScalarVariable.description: Actual resistance = R*(1 + alpha*(T_heatPort - T_ref))

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: torque2.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Accelerating torque acting at flange (= -flange.tau)

ScalarVariable.name: const.k
ScalarVariable.description: Constant output value

ScalarVariable.name: const.y
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real output signal

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.V
ScalarVariable.description: Value of constant voltage

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.p.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.v
ScalarVariable.description: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

ScalarVariable.name: emf.k
ScalarVariable.description: Transformation coefficient

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.J
ScalarVariable.description: Moment of inertia

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossTable[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Array for mesh efficiencies and bearing friction depending on speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossTable[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Array for mesh efficiencies and bearing friction depending on speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossTable[1,3]
ScalarVariable.description: Array for mesh efficiencies and bearing friction depending on speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossTable[1,4]
ScalarVariable.description: Array for mesh efficiencies and bearing friction depending on speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.lossTable[1,5]
ScalarVariable.description: Array for mesh efficiencies and bearing friction depending on speed

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.ratio
ScalarVariable.description: Transmission ratio (flange_a.phi/flange_b.phi)

ScalarVariable.name: ramp.duration
ScalarVariable.description: Duration of ramp (= 0.0 gives a Step)

ScalarVariable.name: ramp.height
ScalarVariable.description: Height of ramps

ScalarVariable.name: ramp.offset
ScalarVariable.description: Offset of output signal y

ScalarVariable.name: ramp.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.R
ScalarVariable.description: Resistance at temperature T_ref

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed device temperature if useHeatPort = false

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.T_heatPort
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature of heatPort

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.T_ref
ScalarVariable.description: Reference temperature

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature coefficient of resistance (R_actual = R*(1 + alpha*(T_heatPort - T_ref))

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.p.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: torque.flange.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: torque.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Accelerating torque acting at flange (= -flange.tau)

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.n.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.n.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: constantVoltage.p.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.flange.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: emf.flange.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: emf.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing from positive to negative pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.n.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.n.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.p.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.p.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: emf.tauElectrical
ScalarVariable.description: Electrical torque

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.flange_a.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.flange_b.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.flange_b.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of component

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.flange_a.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.flange_b.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.flange_b.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.w_a
ScalarVariable.description: Angular velocity of flange_a with respect to support

ScalarVariable.name: ramp.y
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real output signal

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.n.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.n.v
ScalarVariable.description: Potential at the pin

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.p.i
ScalarVariable.description: Current flowing into the pin

ScalarVariable.name: torque.flange.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: torque2.flange.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of flange

ScalarVariable.name: torque2.flange.tau
ScalarVariable.description: Cut torque in the flange

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.mode
ScalarVariable.description: Mode of friction element (unknown, not active, forward/backward rolling, stuck)

ScalarVariable.name: inertia.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi and w as states

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.ideal
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if losses are neglected (that is lossTable = [0, 1, 1, 0, 0])

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.locked
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if gear is locked

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.startBackward
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if starting to roll backward

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.startForward
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if starting to roll forward

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_aPos
ScalarVariable.description: Only for backwards compatibility (was previously: true, if torque of flange_a is not negative)

ScalarVariable.name: emf.useSupport
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.useHeatPort
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if heatPort is enabled

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.useSupport
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

ScalarVariable.name: resistor.useHeatPort
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if heatPort is enabled

ScalarVariable.name: torque.useSupport
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

ScalarVariable.name: torque2.useSupport
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

ScalarVariable.name: lossyGear.tau_etaPos
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if torque tau_eta is not negative

Unknown.dependenciesKind: dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent dependent
